misc: Might have trouble getting to the tee on time
biography: Jaakko, a notable figure hailing from the esteemed Hirsala Golf, is known just as much for his prowess on the greens as he is for his refined palate as a wine connoisseur. His presence at the Hector Trophée events is always anticipated with great enthusiasm.

With three past appearances, Jaakko is preparing to participate in the upcoming Hector Trophée 2025, which will mark his fourth venture in this esteemed tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Jaakko's dedication and passion for the sport remain unwavering. His commitment to the game is clear for all to see.

A word of caution to his future teammates: scheduling tee times may require a bit of foresight, as Jaakko has been known to occasionally test the limits of punctuality. Nevertheless, his affable nature and undeniable talent make him a valued and respected competitor in the Hector Trophée.
